___smt_constraints.description: constraints given in smt format (faster to parse)

___formulas.description: list of constraints in SMTLib 2 format

___features.description: declared features. Not needed in case the option --features-as-boolean is selected

___selectedFeatures.description: initial selected features. If no features are selected this key is optional

___attribute_values.description: initial values of the attributes if any. If no attributes are present this key is optional

___context_values.description: initial values of the context if any. If no context are present this key is optional

___preferences.description: list of expression to maximize. If boolean expressions the goal is to satisfy them

___time_context.description: Optional filed used to indicate in case there is evolution which context id represent the time.

___optional_features.description: Map or the optional feature ids with a list representing their time validity if there is evolution, empty list otherwise.

additionalProperties.description: List of two element list representing the time bounds if evolution is considered, empty list otherwise.

items.description: The bounds of the time validity if evolution is considered. Extremes included.
